Summary: Black triangle about 100 yards long with 3 blue lights at the tips second time ive seen this craft last time it had red lights.
divs: Sighting Detailsso just about 30 mins ago me and my father were standing outside talking when a blue ball of light flew across the sky way slower than something burning up like a meteor this was far brighter than a star. cobalt in color, slowly dimmed to were you could barley see it then streaked across the sky with a wierd blue streak. this is the second ufo encounter i have had the last one was the day after halloween .
